soulWeapon.advancement0:
Summons the soul of Demon of the Calm, Caethasis, increasing own ATK by 50% for 10 sec. Afterward, hits the enemy with the lowest P.DEF 4 times every 3 sec, dealing a total of ??? P.DMG.
If the target's HP is 50% or above, this hit reduces target's P.DEF by 5% for 5 sec.
If the target's HP is below 50%, this hit increases its DMG by 2 times and will be a Critical Hit.
The P.DEF Reduction effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 14 sec.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Changes the P.DEF Reduction effect to 7%. The DMG Boost effect applied to enemies below 50% HP applies as 3.6 times.

skillInfo.name: Target Sighted
skillInfo.description: Moves behind the enemy with the lowest P.DEF and increase their P.DMG taken by 30%, while knocking them down and inflicting ??? P.DMG. If in a Stealth state, stun said enemy for 6 sec. If not, gain Stealth for 10 sec. While in a Stealth State, Crit Rate and Dodge Rate rises by 50.

skills.light: Reduces the target's Heal Rate by 30%.
skills.dark: For 10 sec, target's P.Crit resistance is reduced by 250.

skillInfo.name: Blade Tornado
skillInfo.description: Attacks nearby enemies 3 times and deals a total of ??? P.DMG, inflicting 1 stack of Bleed per each hit. If used in a Stealth state, target's heal rate is reduced by 70%, and Stealth is dispelled. If not, turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. [Stealth] Crit Rate and Dodge Rate are increased by 50.

skills.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
skills.dark: Recovers 200 mana upon a Crit hit.

dark: Normal attacks have a 15% chance to activate Stealth mode that lasts for 10 sec. While in Stealth mode, normal attacks deal 50% increased DMG.

background.story: An assassin of the Laughing Mask, and Roi's colleague. Although she has a physical advantage over Roi as a Half-Elf, she lacks his worldly wisdom and his ability to connect with others, traits that made him crucial in large-scale operations. This has given her something of an inferiority complex. As the 'Cleaner' of the organization, she was tasked with eliminating any traitors. When Roi abandoned the organization, she set out to chase him to figure out his motivation, leaving all her other tasks behind. Her plans after finding him remain to be seen.

itemIntroductions.weapon: The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core was sealed away. However, years later, the core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of death.
treasures: Laughing Mask has a secret training manual of veteran assassins' stealth techniques. This book describes stealth skills and their applications in detail. Tanya added her own tips, making this manual even more valuable.

A multi-purpose tool of Laughing Masks used for assassination. It is a unique item for Laughing Masks, known for their speed and efficiency in eliminating their targets. Optimized to the wearer's attacking patterns, it improves the handling of throwing weapons and enhances continuous attacks while casting Blade Tornado.

A dagger given to those who complete the first mission of the Laughing Mask. There's a rule that says that assassins should always carry the dagger that has traces of their target. The silent dagger that assassins carry like an amulet consistently whispers to them about death.

A secret weapon that the leader of the Laughing Masks made for Tanya. After watching Tanya flawlessly accomplish countless missions, the leader decided that Tanya was the right one to be sent to the most dangerous of missions and had this secret weapon of Laughing Mask, 'Needle of Silence' delivered to her. Made with advanced biotechnology, it causes the energy flowing inside the body to regurgitate, killing the opponent in the blink of an eye. Most importantly, it is something that would help Tanya to keep the vow of silence when things go wrong and the mission is compromised.
